TopicTitle: Loading Stuck on NavUtilities A Lot Of MechJeb Exceptions

Articles.Content:
It works via a Clean Install, also, it was working before I Used CKAN to install Cryo Engines but even removing it still didnt fix it...

https://www.dropbox.com/s/cj8f3wnqpu624zl/Player.log?dl=0

27 minutes ago, Kemorno said:

It works via a Clean Install, also, it was working before I Used CKAN to install Cryo Engines but even removing it still didnt fix it...

https://www.dropbox.com/s/cj8f3wnqpu624zl/Player.log?dl=0

Apparently it's KSPWheel, but can be also something else borking KSPWheel, than so triggers a bug on the Reflection support on the VM, and then everything trying to use Reflection borks too.

Delete KSPWheel to see if things "get fixed". If not, check on the log for MechJeb complains, and delete that Add'On too.

Once you manage to get a Exceptionless instalment, install back the latest versions of the Add'Ons you need - one by one, so if something go to through the tubes, you will know who triggered it.

22 minutes ago, Lisias said:

Ugh i feel dumb now... I downloaded Kerbal Foundries and assumed that their KerbalWheels was up to date... It wasn't... its all right now...
